Create data package archive (zip)

Source: R/create_data_package_archive.R
create_data_package_archive.Rd

Create data package archive (zip)

create_data_package_archive(packageId, env = "production")

Arguments

packageId

(character) Data package identifier
env

(character) Repository environment. Can be: "production", "staging", or "development".

Value

transaction (character) Transaction identifier. May be used in a subsequent call to:

  • read_data_package_error() to determine the operation status

  • read_data_package_archive() to obtain the Zip archive

Examples

if (FALSE) {

# Create zip archive
transaction <- create_data_package_archive(packageId = "knb-lter-sev.31999.1")
transaction
#> [1] "archive_knb-lter-sev.31999.1_16396683904724129"

# Check creation status
read_data_package_error(transaction)

# Download zip archive
read_data_package_archive(
  packageId = "knb-lter-sev.31999.1", 
  transaction = transaction, 
  path = "./data")
#> |=============================================================| 100%
dir("./data")
#> [1] "knb-lter-sev.31999.1.zip"
}
